<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RemirrorThemeContextType
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [colorMode](./core-types.remirrorthemecontexttype.colormode.md) | <code>string</code> | The color mode being used in the child editors. |
|  [colorModes](./core-types.remirrorthemecontexttype.colormodes.md) | <code>string[]</code> | The list of available color modes. |
|  [css](./core-types.remirrorthemecontexttype.css.md) | <code>typeof css</code> | Access to the css method from within the remirror theme context |
|  [parent](./core-types.remirrorthemecontexttype.parent.md) | <code>RemirrorTheme</code> | The parent of the current theme when one exists. If undefined then this is the \*\*root\*\* remirrorTheme. |
|  [theme](./core-types.remirrorthemecontexttype.theme.md) | <code>RemirrorTheme</code> | The currently active theme. If this is a deeply nested provider then it will extend all parent context themes. |
